name: Advanced tech design. Pew pew shooter
name_original: Advanced tech design. Pew pew shooter
description:
This is my assignment for advanced tech design.

This game was based on risk of rain 2. It was created in about 3 weeks. Works in multiplayer. Supports steam. If you have steam enabled when the game launches you will be able to use steam.

How to play the game:

Left mouse button to shoot your primary attack
Right mouse button to use your secondary attack
R for your ultimate attack
E to open chests
Shift for your movement ability

In the chat you have a few commands you can use to enable cheats. Type /help in game for a list of them.
